name: 33, A Regular Life
description:
This project is an old piece of software done in 72 hours and should be approached as such.  It was uploaded to Newgrounds on Dec 4, 2017 as a Ludum Dare 40 submission with the following description:

PRESS F TO FULLSCREEN
Another weird game for LD40
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/33-a-regular-life
Hear the OST: https://soundcloud.com/beicoli/till-death-do-us-part
Edu Verz: Design & art Quike Zarraga: Codeman! Beícoli: Music Mohammed Bakir Khawam: Art Ivan Papiol: TV
